text: Julio César Anderson Quiroga (27 November 1947 – 7 August 2021) was a Guatemalan professional football striker. He played the majority of his career for C.S.D. Municipal. He also played for the football team and represented them at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Anderson died on 7 August 2021 in New York City, aged 73.Fallece el exfutbolista guatemalteco Julio César Anderson ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Guatemalan footballers
title: Julio César Anderson
